original_title: The Human League: The Very Best Of
overview: The Very Best of the Human League is a DVD by veteran British Synthpop group The Human League, containing most of the bandâ€™s music videos recorded up to that point, digitally re-mastered. The only music video missing is Filling up with Heaven from 1995 which was excluded due to a licensing fee dispute between Virgin Records and EastWest.  The DVD also contains as bonus material 4 notable appearances on UK BBC 1 flagship music program Top of the Pops and two songs from a live set performed on BBC 2 program Later with Jools Holland in 1996.
tagline: The Human League: The Very Best Of
title: The Human League: The Very Best Of
